name: Duck Dash (AJ08Coder)
description:
Duck Dash is a fun and enjoyable game for all ages over 5 years. You can download this game in browser but it is RECOMMENDED you download it due to issues and bugs and lag with the game (mostly music).

This is my first game and first game jam!

WASD  - to move       Mouse - look       Mouse Left button - shoot arrows

Collect bread and get your high score!

I have made it available for Linux but I don't have a Linux and I don't know if it will work so Linux users try it out can comment if it doesn't work. Same thing with Mac.

This game was made with Godot Engine v3.2.2

ENJOY!
